name: æè€å¸ˆä¸æ˜¯ä½ è€å¸ˆ
content: As of now, the crowd has dispersed, and a large number of police forces have been deployed around the school, with roads closed and guarded.

name: æè€å¸ˆä¸æ˜¯ä½ è€å¸ˆ
content: According to the news circulating online, on the evening of the 28th, the local police station in Ningling County urgently notified the public in the group that they were not allowed to go to Yuhuayuan Middle School tomorrow.

name: æè€å¸ˆä¸æ˜¯ä½ è€å¸ˆ
content: At present, many highways in Shangqiu are closed due to heavy fog.

name: æè€å¸ˆä¸æ˜¯ä½ è€å¸ˆ
content: That afternoon, the mayor of Ningling County came out to negotiate with the people. The people demanded "life for life"

name: æè€å¸ˆä¸æ˜¯ä½ è€å¸ˆ
content: On the evening of the 28th, the road was closed and martial law was imposed in Ningling County

name: æè€å¸ˆä¸æ˜¯ä½ è€å¸ˆ
content:
A video of a student from Ningling County Yuhua Middle School describing what happened was forwarded by Douyin netizens in the early morning of the 29th.
But please note that the content of the video is the student's personal subjective description, and the specific cause of the incident has not yet been determined.

name: æè€å¸ˆä¸æ˜¯ä½ è€å¸ˆ
content:
@stardiamond4050 The whole city of Urumqi took to the streets and rushed into the division headquarters that night. The cause was that a local community cadre slapped a child.
All the major social events this year were long-accumulated public grievances that happened to find a random outlet for release.

name: æè€å¸ˆä¸æ˜¯ä½ è€å¸ˆ
content: Currently, in the comment section of the live broadcast room of Henan Shangqiu Internet TV Station, people are asking the leader who is making a report for the truth and lamenting that "it's too dark"

name: æè€å¸ˆä¸æ˜¯ä½ è€å¸ˆ
content: In the early morning of December 29, many intersections in Ningling County were still blocked, and police and plainclothes officers could still be seen stationed at the intersections, checking every passing vehicle.

name: æè€å¸ˆä¸æ˜¯ä½ è€å¸ˆ
content: In the early morning of December 29, Ningling County. The day after the incident, the entire county was shrouded in fog, and police were guarding every intersection in the county. Even so, some people still took to the streets to speak out for the students who fell to their deaths.

name: æè€å¸ˆä¸æ˜¯ä½ è€å¸ˆ
content: Netizens expressed their support in the comment section. One netizen said her husband was taken away by the police.

name: æè€å¸ˆä¸æ˜¯ä½ è€å¸ˆ
content: At midnight on December 28, in Weifang, Shandong, a group of young people clashed on the street. Both sides fired fireworks at each other and fought with machetes and steel pipes. On the morning of the 29th, the police arrested them.

name: æè€å¸ˆä¸æ˜¯ä½ è€å¸ˆ
content: On December 28, in Chenzhou, Hunan, a man got into an argument with a vendor while charging a stall at a roadside stall in Xiangyong Vegetable Market, and then kicked over the vendor's vegetables.

name: æè€å¸ˆä¸æ˜¯ä½ è€å¸ˆ
content: December 28, Guangzhou, Guangdong. On Metro Line 3, an old man poured water on the seat to force passengers to leave in order to get them to give up their seats.

name: æè€å¸ˆä¸æ˜¯ä½ è€å¸ˆ
content: December 28, Guangdong. An old man beat the bus driver after refusing to pay the fare. The aunt beside him tried to persuade him but was also beaten by the old man. A student thought the old man had no money and wanted to help pay, but the old man said he had money but refused to pay and beat the student.

name: æè€å¸ˆä¸æ˜¯ä½ è€å¸ˆ
content:
On December 29, at a forced demolition site in Zhuhai, Guangdong, several law enforcement officers forcibly dragged the owner of a house out of his home and began to demolish it.
Seeing that the home he had spent his entire life building was about to be destroyed, the man clung to the railings and wailed and cried heartbreakingly.

name: æè€å¸ˆä¸æ˜¯ä½ è€å¸ˆ
content:
China Merchants Bank announced that it would "reversely demand wages" from employees
On the evening of December 28, China Merchants Bank issued a resolution of the Board of Supervisors, stating that in order to mitigate various operating and management risks, it would recover a total of 58.24 million yuan in performance-based remuneration from 2,876 employees, with an average "refund" of 20,300 yuan per person, accounting for more than 2.5% of all employees of China Merchants Bank.

name: æè€å¸ˆä¸æ˜¯ä½ è€å¸ˆ
content: On December 29, in Tongxiang City, Zhejiang Province, hundreds of property owners went to the Construction Bureau to protest their rights and demanded that the leaders come down, but the leaders refused to show up.

name: æè€å¸ˆä¸æ˜¯ä½ è€å¸ˆ
content: On December 29, workers at the Xi'an Jiaotong University construction site demanded their wages.

name: æè€å¸ˆä¸æ˜¯ä½ è€å¸ˆ
content: The fighting scene added by netizens

name: æè€å¸ˆä¸æ˜¯ä½ è€å¸ˆ
content: On December 29, a large number of special police were deployed at every intersection in Ningling. A large number of private cars were parked horizontally at key intersections to block the road.

name: æè€å¸ˆä¸æ˜¯ä½ è€å¸ˆ
content:

If you supervise it seriously, then the ones who will be hurt are your political allies or interest groups in this small place, so whenever something happens, the main path is to fool the victim + reduce the impactâ€¦

name: æè€å¸ˆä¸æ˜¯ä½ è€å¸ˆ
content: On December 29, some netizens discovered that food writer Wang Gang was suspected of being "soft banned". After testing Wang Gang's accounts on all platforms, it was found that his Douyin account could not be followed; Xigua Video could not be followed and the homepage showed that the user had been banned; Bilibili could currently be followed; Weibo clicked on "follow" and it showed that it had been followed, but Wang Gang was not in the follow list. In addition, since the "egg fried rice incident", Wang Gang has not posted any videos.

name: æè€å¸ˆä¸æ˜¯ä½ è€å¸ˆ
content:
December 27, Beijing. A bus driver posted a video on a social platform saying that he had just received an emergency notice that the group's total salary was changed from 2,800 yuan to 1,420 yuan, and the payment time was not announced by the superior.
The driver questioned that after Wang Chunjie, the former party secretary and chairman of Beijing Public Transport Group, was investigated for violating laws and disciplines, the drivers' salaries became less. Did the newly appointed officials take advantage of the drivers again?

name: æè€å¸ˆä¸æ˜¯ä½ è€å¸ˆ
content: On December 28, in Guangdong, dozens of migrant workers sat on the edge of the roof of a building, holding up banners to demand their wages, while firefighters downstairs set up air cushions.

name: æè€å¸ˆä¸æ˜¯ä½ è€å¸ˆ
content:
December 29, Shangqiu, Henan.
A police officer posted a video of the police training, which attracted a lot of netizens to mock him in the comment section.
Finally, he had to enable comment protection

name: æè€å¸ˆä¸æ˜¯ä½ è€å¸ˆ
content:
On December 29, the media reported that Wuhan University students released several videos questioning that in an event held by the Wuhan University Calligraphy and Painting Association, all 44 award winners were association cadres or former cadres ranked by rank.
Netizens commented that the calligraphy and painting association of just one university had so many student cadres, which really meant that "everyone has an official position."

name: æè€å¸ˆä¸æ˜¯ä½ è€å¸ˆ
content: Of course, bloated organizations are also part of our traditional culture.

name: æè€å¸ˆä¸æ˜¯ä½ è€å¸ˆ
content: Contributed by an employee of ICBC Handan

name: æè€å¸ˆä¸æ˜¯ä½ è€å¸ˆ
content:
On December 29, a woman reported in her real name that Dai Xiang, secretary of the Party Committee of Guangxi Financing Guarantee Group, had attempted to rape her.
According to her own account, on November 18, Dai Xiang took advantage of the opportunity to take her on a business trip to the hotel to rape her, but failed due to her fierce resistance.
After the incident, although she actively reported it to the relevant departments, she still did not get an effective result. Now she urges netizens to seek justice for her.

name: æè€å¸ˆä¸æ˜¯ä½ è€å¸ˆ
content:
According to the woman's description, on December 25, the public security agency clearly stated in its appraisal opinion that Dai Xiang's DNA was detected on her underwear.
However, when she went to the Commission for Discipline Inspection to provide materials, the Commission for Discipline Inspection advised her to "wait a little longer" and "don't tell anyone yet."
